translations.chinese: 過沛，使人求室家，室家亦已亡，不相得。
translations.english: Passing through Pei, he sent people to seek his family. His family had also fled and they could not find each other.

translations.chinese: 漢王道逢孝惠、魯元，載行。
translations.english: King Han met Xiaohui and Lu Yuan on the road and had them ride in the carriage.

translations.chinese: 楚騎追漢王，漢王急，推墮二子。
translations.english: Chu cavalry pursued King Han. King Han was desperate and pushed the two children off the carriage.
Lord Teng dismounted to pick them up and put them in the carriage, and thus they escaped.

translations.chinese: 審食 其從太公、呂后間行，反遇楚軍，羽常置軍中以為質。
translations.english: Shen Yiji secretly escorted the Duke of Tai and Empress Lü, but encountered Chu troops. Xiang Yu constantly kept them in the army as hostages.
